name: rgou-cloudflare
description: Royal Game of Ur - Ancient Mesopotamian board game with AI opponent

scripts.build: npm run generate:sw && npm run build:wasm-assets && next build
scripts.build:cf: npm run generate:sw && npm run build:wasm-assets && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build
scripts.build:wasm: cd worker/rust_ai_core && wasm-pack build --target web --out-name rgou_ai_worker -- --features wasm --no-default-features
scripts.build:wasm-assets: npm run build:wasm && rm -rf public/wasm && mkdir -p public/wasm && cp worker/rust_ai_core/pkg/rgou_ai_worker_bg.wasm public/wasm/rgou_ai_worker_bg.wasm && cp worker/rust_ai_core/pkg/rgou_ai_worker.js public/wasm/rgou_ai_core.js
scripts.nuke: rm -rf .next .open-next .wrangler node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run type-check && (cd worker/rust_ai_core && cargo test -- --nocapture) && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:e2e
scripts.check:slow: npm run lint && npm run type-check && (cd worker/rust_ai_core && RUN_SLOW_TESTS=1 cargo test --features slow_tests -- --nocapture) && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:rust:slow: cd worker/rust_ai_core && RUN_SLOW_TESTS=1 cargo test --features slow_tests -- --nocapture
scripts.test:ml-v2: cd worker/rust_ai_core && NUM_GAMES=20 cargo test test_ml_v2_vs_expectiminimax_ai -- --nocapture
scripts.test:ml-hybrid: cd worker/rust_ai_core && NUM_GAMES=20 cargo test test_ml_hybrid_vs_expectiminimax_ai -- --nocapture
scripts.train:ml: cd worker/rust_ai_core && cargo run --bin train --release --features training -- train 1000 50 0.001 32 3
scripts.train:ml:test: cd worker/rust_ai_core && cargo run --bin train --release --features training -- train 100 10 0.001 32 3
scripts.train:ml:v2: caffeinate cd worker/rust_ai_core && cargo run --bin train --release --features training -- train 5000 100 0.001 32 3 ml_ai_weights_v2.json
scripts.train:ml:v5: caffeinate cd worker/rust_ai_core && cargo run --bin train --release --features training -- train 5000 100 0.001 32 4 ml_ai_weights_v5.json
